Feedback.DoYouHaveBugReportOrFeatureRequest: Do you have a bug to report or a feature request?
Feedback.HowToCreateTicket: Please read the recommendations on writing a good %1$sbug report%2$s or %3$sfeature request%4$s. Then register or login on %5$sour issue tracker%6$s and create a %7$snew issue%8$s.
Feedback.LearnWaysToParticipate: Learn about all the ways you can %1$s participate%2$s
Feedback.ManuallySendEmailTo: Please manually send your message to
Feedback.PluginDescription: Send your Feedback to the Matomo Team. Share your ideas and suggestions to make Matomo the best analytics platform in the world!
Feedback.PrivacyClaim: Matomo respects your %1$sprivacy%2$s and gives you full control over your data.
Feedback.RateFeatureLeaveMessageDislike: How can we improve this feature?
Feedback.RateFeatureLeaveMessageDislikeExtra: Please let us know more about how we can do better so we can improve Matomo.
Feedback.RateFeatureLeaveMessageDislikeExtraBugs: We're sorry that you encountered issues, please let us know more about what didn't work.
Feedback.RateFeatureLeaveMessageDislikeExtraSpeed: Could you provide an indication of how slow this feature is for you? Could you share how many visits per month you would typically record?
Feedback.RateFeatureLeaveMessageDislikeExtraEasie: Was there a particular part of this feature you found difficult to use?
Feedback.RateFeatureLeaveMessageLike: What do you like most about this feature?
Feedback.RateFeatureLeaveMessageLikeNamedFeature: What do you like most about %1$s?
Feedback.RateFeatureLeaveMessageLikeExtra: Please let us know more about how you use this feature so we can improve Matomo further.
Feedback.RateFeatureLeaveMessageLikeExtraUseful: Can you let us know a bit about how you use this information and what you find most useful about it?
Feedback.RateFeatureLeaveMessageLikeExtraEasy: Is there anything else that could make Matomo easier to use or improve your experience?
Feedback.RateFeatureLeaveMessageLikeExtraConfigur: Are there any configuration options you find particularly useful? Are there any other options you would like to see?
Feedback.RateFeatureSendFeedbackInformation: Your Matomo platform will send us (the Matomo team) an email (including your email address) so we can get in contact with you if you have any question.
Feedback.RateFeatureTitle: Do you like the '%s' feature? Please let us know so we can improve Matomo.
Feedback.ThankYou: Thank you for helping us to make Matomo better!
Feedback.ThankYouHeart: Thank you for helping us to make Matomo better! %1$s
Feedback.ThankYouForSpreading: Thank you for spreading the word and creating a safer web
Feedback.TopLinkTooltip: Tell us what you think, or request Professional Support.
Feedback.ViewUserGuides: Learn how to configure Matomo and how to effectively analyze your data with our %1$suser guides%2$s
Feedback.ProfessionalServicesIntro: With a Matomo On-Premise Support Subscription, let our experienced team assist you online in utilising Matomo Analytics to grow your business.
Feedback.ProfessionalServicesOfferIntro: What services can you benefit from?
Feedback.ProfessionalServicesDedicatedSupport: Support from a dedicated Matomo team member every step of the way
Feedback.ProfessionalServicesOnboarding: Onboarding questionnaire and meeting with a Matomo Support member
Feedback.ProfessionalServicesTraining: Exclusive access to Matomo training videos
Feedback.ProfessionalServicesEmailAlerts: Email alerts for security releases for Matomo
Feedback.VisitTheForums: Visit the %1$s Forums%2$s and get help from the community of Matomo users
Feedback.PleaseLeaveExternalReviewForMatomo: We really appreciate your feedback. If you have a minute, please share your thoughts on one of these sites and inspire others to join our data revolution.
Feedback.NotTrackingVisits: Why isn’t Matomo tracking any visits?
Feedback.TrackMultipleSites: How do I track multiple sites or subdomains?
Feedback.RemoveOtherLabel: I want to see my 'Others' data
Feedback.PurgeOldData: I want to remove some old data
Feedback.ReferBannerLonger: Please help us spread the word about us so more people get control over their analytics data.
Feedback.ReferBannerEmailShareSubject: Refer them to Matomo Analytics now to take back control!
Feedback.ReferBannerEmailShareBody:
I choose Matomo, an ethical alternative to Google Analytics that gives me 100%% data ownership and protects the data of my website visitors.
I’m sharing this message in the hope that you too will take back the power from Google and get complete ownership of your own data.

Check out Matomo at https://matomo.org
Feedback.ReferBannerSocialShareText: If you’re using Google Analytics, stay in control by switching to an ethical alternative like Matomo now!
Feedback.FormNotEnoughFeedbackText: Please don't forget to share your feedback below.
Feedback.WontShowAgain: We won't show this message again.
Feedback.Question0: What are your biggest problems or pain points with Matomo and why?
Feedback.Question1: What is the one thing you’d like to see improved in Matomo and why?
Feedback.Question2: What is the feature you are missing the most in Matomo and why?
Feedback.Question3: What is your main goal for using Matomo?
Feedback.Question4: What is your main concern about Matomo?
Feedback.FeedbackSubtitle:
Here's your chance to ask for it! Please describe in as much details as you can.
Your feedback will help us improve Matomo. %1$s
Feedback.ThankYourForFeedback: We really appreciate your feedback! %1$s We will be in touch in case we require more information about your feedback.
Feedback.Policy: Your message and your email address will be sent to us by submitting this form. The information will be only used to improve our products and services. Your data will be processed by us, our hosting provider, and our support ticket provider. For more information have a look at %1$sMatomo's Privacy Policy%2$s.
Feedback.MessageBodyValidationError: The message body is too short (minimum is 10 characters).
Feedback.HowToMigrateFromGA: How do I migrate from Google Analytics?
Feedback.HowToDefineAndTrackGoals: How do I define and track Goal conversions?
Feedback.HowToGetStartedWithMtm: How do I get started with Matomo Tag Manager?
Feedback.HowToMigrateFromGtm: How do I migrate from Google Tag Manager?
Feedback.HowToTrackEcommerce: How do I track Ecommerce orders?
Feedback.KnowledgeBaseDescription: FAQs, comprehensive guides, how-to’s and troubleshooting documents.
Feedback.CommunityForumDescription: Ask questions, browse solutions or share your knowledge with the Matomo Community.
Feedback.GlossaryDescription: Learn the definitions of terminology used in Matomo and web analytics.
Feedback.MatomoVideoTrainingDescription: Learn the fundamentals of web analytics and how to use Matomo.
Feedback.MtmVideoTrainingDescription: Get started or uncover more ways to master the power of Matomo Tag Manager.
